data.convo: Excuse me . We ordered too much . May we take the food home ? Yes , surely . Do I have to pay extra charge for that ? No , you don't . It is free of charge . Well , then , will you put this and that into doggie bags ? Certainly , would you wait for a few minutes ? Thanks . Would you give me another favor ? Yes , what is it ? Some more Chinese tea for us , please . Sure , I'll be back in a minute .
